title: PNC Internal Policy: Mortgage Underwriting Guidelines - Residential
text: # PNC Internal Policy: Mortgage Underwriting Guidelines - Residential

title: Overview
text:
## Overview
These guidelines apply to standard residential mortgage loans for primary residences.

title: Credit Requirements
text:
## Credit Requirements
- **Minimum FICO Score**: 620 for Conventional loans, 580 for FHA.
- **Bankruptcy**: Minimum 4 years since Chapter 7 discharge for Conventional; 2 years for FHA.

title: Income and Employment
text:
## Income and Employment
- **Employment History**: Minimum 2 years of continuous employment in the same industry.
- **Self-Employed**: Requires 2 years of personal and business tax returns.

title: Debt-to-Income (DTI) Limits
text:
## Debt-to-Income (DTI) Limits
- **Front-End Ratio**: Maximum 28% (Housing expense to gross monthly income).
- **Back-End Ratio**: Maximum 43% (Total debt obligations to gross monthly income).
- **Exceptions**: Up to 50% back-end ratio may be considered with compensating factors such as significant cash reserves or high credit score (>740).

title: Loan-to-Value (LTV) Limits
text:
## Loan-to-Value (LTV) Limits
- **Primary Residence**: Up to 97% LTV for qualified first-time homebuyers.
- **Standard**: 95% LTV.
- **Investment Property**: Maximum 80% LTV.

title: PNC Internal Policy: Small Business Administration (SBA) 7(a) Loan Guidelines
text: # PNC Internal Policy: Small Business Administration (SBA) 7(a) Loan Guidelines

title: Overview
text:
## Overview
The SBA 7(a) loan program is PNC's primary program for providing financial assistance to small businesses.

title: Eligibility Requirements
text:
## Eligibility Requirements
To qualify for an SBA 7(a) loan through PNC, the applicant must meet the following criteria:
1. **Business Type**: Must be a for-profit business operating in the United States.
2. **Size Standards**: Must meet SBA size standards (typically under $8M in annual revenue for most service industries).
3. **Credit Score**: Minimum personal credit score of 680 for all owners with 20% or more stake.
4. **Debt-to-Income (DTI)**: Maximum DTI ratio of 43% for personal guarantors.
5. **Debt Service Coverage Ratio (DSCR)**: The business must demonstrate a minimum DSCR of 1.25x based on historical or projected cash flow.

title: Use of Funds
text:
## Use of Funds
Funds may be used for:
- Expansion or renovation
- Purchase of land or buildings
- Purchase of equipment or fixtures
- Working capital
- Refinancing existing debt

title: Guarantee Requirements
text:
## Guarantee Requirements
Personal guarantees are required from all individuals who own 20% or more of the business.
